title: Mango Teriyaki Marinade
description: Use this sweet and tangy marinade on chicken or pork!
instructions: In a blender, thoroughly mix mango nectar, teriyaki sauce, dried cherries, garlic, salt and pepper. In the refrigerator, marinate meat in the mixture at least 2 hours before grilling as desired.
author: [{'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'Anna Oliva'}]
